overview: Brash ladies' man James Dale and his partner, wisecracking Everett Northrup, are sent by Cartell & Co. jewelers to safeguard the arrival of the famous Stonehaven necklace at one of its branch offices, recently the victim of a jewel robbery.
tagline: IT'S THAT KIND OF PICTURE! A Gang of Thieves, a Guy, a Gal & a Stolen Necklace!
title: Shadow of Suspicion
